item.description:
This is a spectator event but if you are brave..well then join in with the water tamers..

I have not picked out a meeting spot yet, so this is of general information as of now,

I would like to hike at the McLean Game Preserve first then go to this event and observe near the finish area. I am expecting lots of people here so parking is an unknown factor...Heck...park anywhere and walk a bit.....

So i will just leave the website and let you decide..
Perhaps a few of us can link together at the hike or here...about 12:30/1:00
http://www.scanticspr...



The Scantic Spring Splash is growing as a spectator event. Hundreds of spectators will line the Finish Area. Great fun for all ages to watch the canoes and kayaks come down the rapids just off South Maple Street.

The boats will start to arrive into the area around 12:30pm - 1pm.

I think they mean the rapids area here...the finish is a bit further down and should take a bit longer i would expect....
But look at the map on the web site if you are interested...
Maps of spectator areas are available in the Race HQ.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: River Splash on the Scantic River
